== Jua (CT) (626727) ==

Jua (CT) is a town in the [[TISWADI 003]] taluka of [[NORTH GOA]] district with an area of 8.3 sq. km. and harbouring 1057 households with total population of 4134 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 22 km. The state headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 22 km. Male population is 1971 and female population is 2163. Scheduled Caste population is 38 and Scheduled Tribes population is 84. Census Location Code of the town is 626727<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class VI (population_total < 5,000).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is BELGAUM at a distance of 158 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is PUNE at a distance of 534 km. Railway station is at CARAMBOLIM at a distance of 12 km.
